articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.title: Sony explains massive PSN outage and details compensation – but many PlayStation gamers are still unhappy - TechRadar
articles.description: PSN downtime was due to ‘operational issue’ and Sony is giving 5 free days as compensation
articles.content:
• PSN has just recovered from a 24-hour outage
  • Sony says the downtime was caused by an “operational issue” with network services
  • Compensation is 5 free days of service for PlayS… [+3517 chars]
